site.features: Satellity is PRE-ALPHA now! Please be careful when you decide to use it!

avatar.title: Make your own free avatar
avatar.description: Make your own free avatar online, a free online avatar generator for anyone to make their beautiful personal avatar easily!
avatar.head: Avatar Maker
avatar.subtitle: Create Your Own Avatar For Free!

page.title: How to make you own avatar?
page.description: Making an avatar is very simple, just click the different parts, like hair, accessory, beard, etc to switch the selection, and then click the favorite style. You can see the result on the right (or above) immediately. Also You can click the download button to get your avatar. Enjoy it! Any questions, feedbacks are appreciated, feel free to submit in the forum.
page.thanks: Special Thanks: avatar is designed by Pablo Stanley, and npm is developed by Fang-Pen Lin.

topic.rules:
